title: Remote For Pioneer AV Receivers and Blu-Ray
summary: A "Pioneer" AVR/BD Alternative app 7 day trial with universal IR/Wi-Fi support
description: MyAV is an unofficial Pioneer AV Receiver & Blu-Ray Wi-Fi remote control app. Pioneer is a trademark of the Pioneer Corporation.Includes the ability to rename, remote and reorder inputs, multi zone control and a DLNA browser.This app can be viewed portrait or landscape (default) and is design with high res graphics for tablets.Not only this but MyAV can also control a range of other products, (whilst still controlling the volume of your Pioneer). Other devices include Blu-ray players, TV's, set-top boxes, cable & sat.If you have IR on your Android device then this app can control even more devicesNetwork radio browsing support coming soon!A full compatibility list can be found on our site:http://myav.co.uk/compatiblity.htmCompatible Pioneer receivers include:2015:All receiver, please contact us if you receiver isn't found.2014: VSX-924, VSX-1024, VSX-1124 (untested)2013: VSX-70, VSX-923 (tested), VSX-1123, SC-71, SC-72, SC-75, SC-77, SC-79, SC-1523, SC-2023, SC-LX57, SC-LX77, SC-LX872012: VSX-60, VSX-922 (tested), VSX-1122 (tested), SC-61, SC-63, SC-65, SC-67, SC-68, SC-1222, SC-1522, SC-2022 (tested), SC-LX56 (tested), SC-LX76 (tested), SC-LX86 (tested)2011: VSX-50, VSX-51, VSX-52, VSX-53, VSX-921 , VSX-1021 , VSX-1121, VSX-2021,  SC-55, SC-57, VSX-LX55, SC-LX75, SC-LX852010: VSX-30, VSX-31,, VSX-32, VSX-33, SC-35, SC-37, VSX-920, VSX1020, VSX1025, VSX1120, VSX2020, VSX-LX53, SC-LX73, SC-LX83LIMITED FEEDBACK:VSX-42, VSX-43, VSX-527 (tested), VSX-528, VSX-822, VSX-823, VSX-827 (tested), VSX-828, VSX-1022, VSX-1023, VSXS510, VSX824, VSX424, VSX529Compatible Pioneer blu-ray players include:2013: BDP-160 (untested), BDP62FD (untested)2012: BDP-450 (tested), BDP-150 (tested),2011: BDP-LX55 (tested), BDP-440 (tested), BDP-140 (tested)          BDP-53FD (tested), BDP-52FD (tested)2010: BDP-LX54 , BDP-330 This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP controllable devices.
descriptionHTML:
MyAV is an unofficial Pioneer AV Receiver & Blu-Ray Wi-Fi remote control app. Pioneer is a trademark of the Pioneer Corporation.
Includes the ability to rename, remote and reorder inputs, multi zone control and a DLNA browser.
This app can be viewed portrait or landscape (default) and is design with high res graphics for tablets.

Not only this but MyAV can also control a range of other products, (whilst still controlling the volume of your Pioneer). Other devices include Blu-ray players, TV's, set-top boxes, cable & sat.

If you have IR on your Android device then this app can control even more devices

Network radio browsing support coming soon!
A full compatibility list can be found on our site:
http://myav.co.uk/compatiblity.htm

Compatible Pioneer receivers include:
2015:All receiver, please contact us if you receiver isn't found.
2014: VSX-924, VSX-1024, VSX-1124 (untested)
2013: VSX-70, VSX-923 (tested), VSX-1123, SC-71, SC-72, SC-75, SC-77, SC-79, SC-1523, SC-2023, SC-LX57, SC-LX77, SC-LX87
2012: VSX-60, VSX-922 (tested), VSX-1122 (tested), SC-61, SC-63, SC-65, SC-67, SC-68, SC-1222, SC-1522, SC-2022 (tested), SC-LX56 (tested), SC-LX76 (tested), SC-LX86 (tested)
2011: VSX-50, VSX-51, VSX-52, VSX-53, VSX-921 , VSX-1021 , VSX-1121, VSX-2021, SC-55, SC-57, VSX-LX55, SC-LX75, SC-LX85
2010: VSX-30, VSX-31,, VSX-32, VSX-33, SC-35, SC-37, VSX-920, VSX1020, VSX1025, VSX1120, VSX2020, VSX-LX53, SC-LX73, SC-LX83


LIMITED FEEDBACK:
VSX-42, VSX-43, VSX-527 (tested), VSX-528, VSX-822, VSX-823, VSX-827 (tested), VSX-828, VSX-1022, VSX-1023, VSXS510, VSX824, VSX424, VSX529

Compatible Pioneer blu-ray players include:
2013: BDP-160 (untested), BDP62FD (untested)
2012: BDP-450 (tested), BDP-150 (tested),
2011: BDP-LX55 (tested), BDP-440 (tested), BDP-140 (tested)
BDP-53FD (tested), BDP-52FD (tested)
2010: BDP-LX54 , BDP-330

This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP controllable devices.
comments: Works OK but there's no way to change radio stations, maybe add a couple of buttons. 8.99 for an app should have the basics.

My VSX-1020 isn't wired to my network (I have no method of connection because the unit isn't wireless and my router resides in another room). I planned on using my J3's IR Blaster for control, but the app wont let me select a VSX-1020 without making me enter an IP address, and so the functionality won't manifest on the app because it's requiring my receiver be on my network. How do I fix this?
Only basic functionality on my VSX528! would pay if it worked for my amp. No speaker configuration which is what I'm looking for as no remote control with this amp
Awsome, Found VSX 1120 and set it up automatically! Shows surround settings and  volume levels right on screen.
recentChanges: Support for Sky Pro & Sky HD (Cable) Germany
